Projects : 
 
Migration of Exchange Server 2010 On -Premise  to Exchange  Server 2016  
June  2017 – July 2017  
Project description  
 Health Check Assessment for Directory Service.  
 Health Check Assessment for Messaging Services.  
 High Level Design Architecture for Directory Services.  
 High Level Design Architecture for Messaging Services.  
 Migration Planning for Messaging Services Transition.  
 Prepare Directory Services for Transition.  
 Install and Configure virtual Windows Server 2016  - Exchange Server 2016 –Active, 
Passive,  DR-Passive.  
 Prepare Messaging Services for Transition.   Adjust Client Access endpoint with publically registered name, enable Outlook 
Anywhere and verify Outlook Clients are connecting to new CAS namespace.  
 Install and Configure three virtual Exchange 2016 servers with Client Access and 
Mailbox Roles.  
 Adjust Exchange 2016 CAS Internal and External URLs and Install UC SSL 
Certificate.  
 Install and Configure DAG on Exchange 2016 mailbox servers for onsite Exchange 
Datab ase Resiliency.  
 Create Mailbox Databases on Exchange 2016 and replicate them via DAG.  
 Configure Intra Org email between Exchange 2010 and Exchange 2016.  
 Configure Inter Org email between POP Downloader and new Exchange 2016.  
 Swing CAS namespace to new Exch ange 2016 Servers and configure DNS 
distribution via DNS round robin for CAS High Availability.  
 Securely publish Exchange 2016 Client Access Services to internet via existing 
firewall.  
 Verify Outlook Connectivity to legacy mailboxes via new Exchange 2016 S ervers.  
 Conduct ~20 pilot user migration from Exchange 2010 to Exchange 2016.  
 Production user migration from Exchange 2010 to Exchange 2016.  
 Migrate Exchange Organization Messaging Services from Exchange 2010 to 
Exchange 2016.  
 Uninstall Exchange 2010 Mailbox Servers and join them to workgroup.  
 Uninstall Exchange 2010 CAS \HUB Server and join them to workgroup.  
 Deployment of anti -virus agents on new servers.  
 Deployment of backup age
